docs.text: Template ¶ This Template Project use Cookiecutter for generate/boostrap Github Projects. With a base set of CI/CD tools and Release Process. Scope from the Templates ¶ This Template shoud be handle different base Ci/Cd steps. Static Tests ¶ Generate a base set of workflows for execute Static Tests, like linting. pre-commit/action zbeekman/EditorConfig-Action Release Process ¶ The Release Process will be implemented by different Workflows and Apps, for example toolmantim/release-drafter for creating a GitHub Changelog. Release Publish Docs ¶ mhausenblas/mkdocs-deploy-gh-pages Project Configuration ¶ Settings ¶ probot/settings Labeling ¶ probot/stale kaxil/boring-cyborg Templates ¶ docs.github.com Templates
